courses.title: Introduction to C Programming
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming with this introductory course. Build a strong foundation in programming.

courses.title: Introduction to Algorithms
courses.description: Explore the world of algorithms and problem-solving. Gain essential skills for computer science.

courses.title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
courses.description: Master C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms. Enhance your programming abilities.

courses.title: Basic Data Structures
courses.description: Learn essential data structures and their applications. Level up your coding skills.

courses.title: Introduction to OOP Python
courses.description: Discover the power of Object-Oriented Programming in Python. Start building real-world projects.

courses.title: Software Engineering
courses.description: Dive into the world of Software Engineering. Learn software development methodologies and best practices.

courses.title: AWS, Cloud Computing
courses.description: Explore Amazon Web Services and Cloud Computing. Deploy scalable and reliable applications.

courses.title: Database (MySQL)
courses.description: Master MySQL database management. Design and optimize databases for various applications.

courses.title: Problem-Solving Part
courses.description: Enhance your problem-solving skills. Solve coding challenges and prepare for interviews.
